Package clientHandlers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizedCustomerTask
    handle the authorized customer actions, can view the catalog, get his orders history, pay for order ,place order and update order status
    BranchEmployeeTask
    handle the branch employee actions, can get survey, get all the survey and add survey answers
    BranchManagerTask
    Handle the branch manager actions can update the user data, update the order status and get all the order belonging to his branch
    CEOTask
    Handle the ceo actions, can watch reports
    ClientTasks
    the abstarct class for the client task, for each type of connected client we have a extended class to handle the tasks, the tasks handles dont care which client in connected, we save error and completed msgs, database controller , the client task handler(for login\out) and the active user object
    CourierTask
    The courier actions.
    CustomerServiceEmloyeeTask
    handle the customer service employee actions, can create complaint, update complaint, create new survey, add survey result and get all the complaints he responsible for
    HandleClientTask
    handle the client task, manage the connection to different user types and handle the tasks for the server
    MarketingEmployeeTask
    handle the marketing employee, can use and edit the catalog and manage promotions
    NonAuthorizedCustomerTask
    handle the non authorized customer actions, can view the catalog, orders history and cancel orders
    NoUserTask
    the action for non connected user, can login
